tool_description: Looking for an app that can provide caller ID, number lookup, and call functionality, allowing you to distinguish incoming calls from contacts and display the region and location.
name: Phone Number Caller ID Lookup
title: Phone Number Caller ID Lookup

api_list.name: Get Country Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-number-caller-id-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-caller-id-lookup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://phone-number-caller-id-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-caller-id-lookup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
